name: Dream eScape (itch) (FluxPunk)
description:
Find the key.

Open the portal.

Escape the dream.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Dream eScape is my first game and my entry for the Stop Waiting for Godot Jam. The concept is simple, avoid the spirits, find the key, and open the exit.

My goal was to learn and I learned a lot about what needs to go into a game for it to be a playable experience. It was also important to learn  how to share the game once it is done. I'm inspired to continue practicing game design with Godot and I look forward to creating larger experiences in future game jams. Thank you  for taking time to check out my submission.

Design, programming, and music was done by me.  Credit to Canari Games for their 8BIT sprites and sound effects. And a special thanks goes out to my son and daughter for play-testing!
